entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
